channel.title: Titanz-clashpkz 317
channel.description:
[b][size=24pt]Titanz-clashpkz 317[/size][/b]
This Server Base is [Project Insanity]
- [b]Pictures[/b] -
[b]Armadyl Godsword Speacial[/b]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/a47ksh.gif[/img]
[b]Saradomin Godsword Speacial[/b] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2e37r7s.gif[/img]
[b]Zamorak Godsword peacial[/b] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/25f21q9.gif[/img]
[b]Bandos Godsword Speacial[/b] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/sllbtc.gif[/img]
[b]DClaws Special[/b]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/j9a9p1.jpg[/img]
- [b][size=18pt]Melee System[/size][b] -
474 godswords & have correct Speacials & GFX. 474 Whip emote. 474 Veng Emote/GFX. 474 Veng Other Emote/GFX. 474 Rune Defender Block. Dragon Claws Correct Emote Only hits twice on NPC's but 4 Times on players (i increased the damage). Melee Following 100%. Anchor Emote 100% No GFX though You can add easily.
- [b][size=18pt]Mage System[/size][/b] -
Instant Barrage. Mage Following Works 99%. Blitz Timer set to 4 Seconds (will blitz every 4 seconds with auto cast). 474 Magic Book for Modern,Ancients and Lunar imported. Updated Magic Shop Prices etc... Not much more then that.
- [b][size=18pt]Range System[/size][/b] -
474 Cross bow shooting emote. 474 Cross bow Running emote. 474 Range Stand is in the class 20 for animations just find it and you can set it in Server if you want . Range Following 99%.
- [b][size=18pt]NPC System[/size][/b] -
100% Animted Bandos boss / Minions. 100% Animated Zamorak boss / Minions. 100% Animated Saradomin Boss / Minions. 100% Animated Armadyl boss / Minions. Added Gnome to talk to at talk to him to get to the King of the caves / Crazy Bitch.
- [b][size=18pt]Mini Games[/size][/b] -
Pest Controll 100%. Fight Caves 100% 1 wave = Jad (Fixed this up alot). Fight Pits 100%. Fun pk 99%. Barros 80% just go in the tunnels and kill each of the barrows brothers.
- [b]Shops[/b] -
Updated Shops alot and Changed home to edgeville. Made Donor Shop also with Points . Updated Shop at donator Zone. Made pure shop. Made Party Pete Donator Shop .
~[b][size=18pt]Skills[/size][/b]~ Attack - 100% Defence - 100% Strength - 100% Hitponts - 100% Range - 100% Magic - 100% needs rune requirements Prayer - 100% Cooking - 75% need to add all ranges Woodcutting - 100% Fletching - 95%need to add picking flax ...... Fishing - 95%just needs some more spots Firemaking - 100%need to fix the no-clipping and color fire Crafting - 75%need to add more crafting Smithing - 95%need to add all the furnace Mining - 100%need to add more rock locations Herb - 75%All super potions exept for base Agility - 90% need to add more area Theiving - 75%need to add stalls Slayer - 100% add more stuff Farminig - 100% add moste of it Runecrafting - 85%add the teleports Hunter - 90% Construction - 75% Need to add more npcs to catch! Summoning - 95% need to make summoned monsters attack with you and npc defintions
updating more pics soon!

item.title: Titanz-clashpkz 317
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Great, I’ll C&P some of this to the Teams section.
